original_prompt: A door with a pet enterance.
video_prompt: The camera slowly pans down to reveal a pet entrance at the bottom of the door.

original_prompt: A photo of a tree. Taken in autumn.
video_prompt: The leaves on the tree start to change color, transitioning from green to shades of orange and red, gently falling to the ground as the sky turns a soft autumn gray.

original_prompt: A person giving a thumbs up.
video_prompt: The person lifts their right hand, smoothly transitioning into a thumbs up.

original_prompt: A sitting flamingo.
video_prompt: The flamingo gracefully bends its legs and lowers itself to a sitting position on the sand.

original_prompt: A vase of flowers filled with green water.
video_prompt: The clear water in the vase gradually turns green.

original_prompt: A horse raising its head.
video_prompt: The horse gently lifts its head from grazing, looking toward the water.

original_prompt: A photo of a traffic jam.
video_prompt: Cars start to appear gradually on the empty highway, filling up the lanes until traffic comes to a standstill.

original_prompt: A photo of a sliced banana.
video_prompt: The banana peels itself, and slices start to appear.

original_prompt: A photo of a cat yawning.
video_prompt: The cat slowly closes its eyes and stretches its mouth wide, transitioning smoothly into a yawn.

original_prompt: A photo of a yawning dog.
video_prompt: The dog stands still, then slowly lowers its head and opens its mouth in a yawn.

original_prompt: A photo of a coffee house in a street.
video_prompt: The camera pans down the cobblestone street, reaching a cozy coffee house with people seated outside, sipping drinks.

original_prompt: A teddy bear holding a cup.
video_prompt: The teddy bear's arm gently moves upwards, a small cup appears in its grasp.

original_prompt: A goat to the right of a cat.
video_prompt: The goat and the cat gently nudge each other until the goat moves to the right of the cat.

original_prompt: A photo of a dead tree.
video_prompt: The vibrant green leaves gradually wither and fall, leaving behind barren branches against the sky.

original_prompt: A goat hits a cat.
video_prompt: The goat suddenly moves its head, lightly nudging the cat.

original_prompt: A knocked down chair.
video_prompt: The chair slightly tilts and falls over, resting on its side.

original_prompt: Pizza with pepperoni.
video_prompt: As the camera focuses on the pizza, pepperoni slices gradually appear on top, sizzling as they touch the cheese.

original_prompt: A photo of a dog laying down.
video_prompt: The dog slowly lowers itself to the ground, transitioning from standing to laying down.

original_prompt: A photo of a jumping dog.
video_prompt: The dog crouches slightly, then springs into a joyful jump against the sky, capturing the moment mid-air.

original_prompt: A photo of an open box.
video_prompt: The video begins with the closed box. A hand uses the knife to cut open the tape, and the flaps gently unfold, revealing the open box.

original_prompt: A photo of a fruitful tree.
video_prompt: The tree's branches gradually fill with colorful fruits, swaying gently in a breeze.

original_prompt: A bird eating a fish.
video_prompt: The bird suddenly swoops down into the water, emerging with a fish. It lands back on the perch, then begins eating its catch.

original_prompt: A photo of a jumping cat.
video_prompt: The cat crouches, preparing to jump. With a swift leap, it propels into the air, pausing mid-jump against the pink backdrop.

original_prompt: A horse in a show jumping attire.
video_prompt: The horse transitions as it trots forward, revealing show jumping attire.

original_prompt: A half eaten pizza.
video_prompt: A hand reaches in, taking a piece from the pizza, revealing a half-eaten state.
